Fixed. Added addtional check for native method exception when asking a stack 
frame for its source name. I am getting timeout exceptions when asking for the 
source name.

Log: Tue Dec 18 14:06:13 CST 2001

Caching the source name in the JDIStackFrame seems to avoid this problem (also 
more efficient). Fixed.

Re-assigning for verification. This may be required as a patch to the 1218 
build.
Verified.  Released fix and versioned jdt.debug as v20011218a.
